LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoAffectedAreaScale: Scale the distance affected by volcanos based on world coverage.
The distance set below will be used for a world generated at 30% coverage.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoMaxAffectedArea: The maximum distance affected by volcanos: ({0} tile/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoMaxAffectedArea_T: The maximum distance is increased by 20% with each category level increase. The displayed value is used for a category 5 volcano.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoEnablePermanentCo: Enable volcanos causing permanent conditions to all tiles in their radius.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoEnableRandomCondi: Enable volcanos causing random conditions to tiles within a certain radius.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoEnableCategoryCha: Enable the category of a volcano changing by 1 every {0} incidents it causes.
Note that the category is not guaranteed to change every {0} incidents.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_VolcanoOnlyLetterIfInRad: Only send a letter for random volcano conditions if either an active map, or a caravan, is within the maximum radius of the volcano.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_CliffRacerEnableExtincti: Wild cliff racers will become extinct once a certain number of them have been either killed, or tamed.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_CliffRacerEnableTracker: Enable the cliff racer tracker alert.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_CliffRacerWildPopulation: The initial number of wild cliff racers: ({0} cliff racer/s)
Changes to this will not take effect mid-save.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_CliffRacerEnableReturn_T: Wild cliff racers will return from extinction once a certain number of them have been released into the wild.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_CliffRacerEnableReturnTh: The minimum number of wild cliff racers before they return: ({0} cliff racer/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_CliffRacerEnableSwarm: Enable the cliff racer swarm incident.
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_CliffRacerSwarmMinSize: The minimum number of cliff racers in the swarm: ({0} cliff racer/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_CliffRacerSwarmMaxSize: The maximum number of cliff racers in the swarm: ({0} cliff racer/s)
LanguageData.Mashed_Ashlands_CliffRacerMutantChance: The chance that a cliff racer gains the asexual reproduction mutation upon reaching maturity: ({0}% chance)
